verses.verse: Then <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H464>Eliphaz<s%> the <S%H8489>Temanite,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%>
Should a <S%H2450>wise<s%> man <S%H6030>utter<s%> <S%H7307>vain<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge,<s%> and <S%H4390>fill<s%> his <S%H990>belly<s%> with the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H7307>wind?<s%>
Should he <S%H3198>reason<s%> with <S%H5532>unprofitable<s%> <S%H1697>talk?<s%> or with <S%H4405>speeches<s%> with which he can <S%H5953>do<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3276>good?<s%>
<S%H637>Yes,<s%> you <S%H6565>cast<s%> off <S%H3374>fear,<s%> and <S%H1639>restrain<s%> <S%H7878>prayer<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H410>God.<s%>
For your <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H502>utters<s%> your <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> and you <S%H977>choose<s%> the <S%H3956>tongue<s%> of the <S%H6175>crafty.<s%>
Your own <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H7561>comdemns<s%> you, and not I: yes, your own <S%H8193>lips<s%> <S%H6030>testify<s%> against you.
Are you the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> that was <S%H3205>born?<s%> or were you <S%H2342>made<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1389>hills?<s%>
Have you <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H5475>secret<s%> of <S%H433>God?<s%> and do you <S%H1639>restrain<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> to <S%H413>yourself?<s%>
<S%H4100>What<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> you, that we <S%H3045>know<s%> not? what <S%H995>understand<s%> you, <S%H1931>which<s%> is not in us?
With us are <S%H1571>both<s%> the gray <S%H7867>headed<s%> and <S%H3453>very<s%> <S%H3453>aged<s%> men, <S%H3524>much<s%> <S%H1419>elder<s%> than your <S%H1>father.<s%>
Are the <S%H8575>consolations<s%> of <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H4592>small<s%> with you? is there any <S%H328>secret<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> with you?
<S%H4100>Why<s%> does your <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H3947>carry<s%> you away? and <S%H4100>what<s%> do your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H7335>wink<s%> at,
That you <S%H7725>turn<s%> your <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H410>God,<s%> and let such <S%H4405>words<s%> <S%H3318>go<s%> out of your <S%H6310>mouth?<s%>
<S%H4100>What<s%> is <S%H582>man,<s%> that he should be <S%H2135>clean?<s%> and he which is <S%H3205>born<s%> of a <S%H802>woman,<s%> that he should be <S%H6663>righteous?<s%>
<S%H2005>Behold,<s%> he puts <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H539>trust<s%> in his <S%H6918>saints;<s%> yes, the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> are not <S%H2141>clean<s%> in his <S%H5869>sight.<s%>
<S%H637>How<s%> much more <S%H8581>abominable<s%> and <S%H444>filthy<s%> is <S%H376>man,<s%> which <S%H8354>drinks<s%> <S%H5766>iniquity<s%> like <S%H4325>water?<s%>
I will <S%H2331>show<s%> you, <S%H8085>hear<s%> me; and that which I have <S%H2372>seen<s%> I will <S%H5608>declare;<s%>
<S%H834>Which<s%> <S%H2450>wise<s%> men have <S%H5046>told<s%> from their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> and have not <S%H3582>hid<s%> it:
To <S%H1992>whom<s%> <S%H905>alone<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> was <S%H5414>given,<s%> and <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2114>stranger<s%> <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> them.

The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> man <S%H2342>travails<s%> with pain <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H3117>days,<s%> and the <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H8141>years<s%> is <S%H6845>hidden<s%> to the <S%H6184>oppressor.<s%>
A <S%H6343>dreadful<s%> <S%H6963>sound<s%> is in his <S%H241>ears:<s%> in <S%H7965>prosperity<s%> the <S%H7703>destroyer<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> on him.
He <S%H539>believes<s%> not that he shall <S%H7725>return<s%> out of <S%H2822>darkness,<s%> and he is <S%H6822>waited<s%> for of the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

He <S%H5074>wanders<s%> <S%H5074>abroad<s%> for <S%H3899>bread,<s%> saying, <S%H346>Where<s%> is it? he <S%H3045>knows<s%> that the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H2822>darkness<s%> is <S%H3559>ready<s%> at his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>
<S%H6862>Trouble<s%> and <S%H4691>anguish<s%> shall make him <S%H1204>afraid;<s%> they shall <S%H8630>prevail<s%> against him, as a <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6264>ready<s%> to the <S%H3593>battle.<s%>
For he <S%H5186>stretches<s%> out his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H410>God,<s%> and <S%H1396>strengthens<s%> himself <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H7706>Almighty.<s%>
He <S%H7323>runs<s%> on him, even on his <S%H6677>neck,<s%> on the <S%H5672>thick<s%> <S%H1354>bosses<s%> of his <S%H4043>bucklers:<s%>
<S%H3588>Because<s%> he <S%H3680>covers<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> with his <S%H2459>fatness,<s%> and <S%H6213>makes<s%> <S%H6371>bulges<s%> of <S%H6371>fat<s%> on his <S%H3689>flanks.<s%>

And he <S%H7931>dwells<s%> in <S%H3582>desolate<s%> <S%H5892>cities,<s%> and in <S%H1004>houses<s%> which <S%H3808>no<s%> man <S%H3427>inhabits,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are <S%H6257>ready<s%> to become <S%H1530>heaps.<s%>

He shall not be <S%H6238>rich,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall his <S%H2428>substance<s%> <S%H6965>continue,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall he <S%H5186>prolong<s%> the <S%H4512>perfection<s%> thereof on the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

He shall not <S%H5493>depart<s%> out of <S%H2822>darkness;<s%> the <S%H7957>flame<s%> shall <S%H3001>dry<s%> up his <S%H3127>branches,<s%> and by the <S%H7307>breath<s%> of his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> shall he <S%H5493>go<s%> away.
Let not him that is <S%H8582>deceived<s%> <S%H539>trust<s%> in <S%H7723>vanity:<s%> for <S%H7723>vanity<s%> shall be his <S%H8545>recompense.<s%>
It shall be <S%H4390>accomplished<s%> <S%H3808>before<s%> his <S%H3117>time,<s%> and his <S%H3712>branch<s%> shall not be <S%H7488>green.<s%>
He shall <S%H2554>shake<s%> off his <S%H1154>unripe<s%> <S%H1154>grape<s%> as the <S%H1612>vine,<s%> and shall <S%H7993>cast<s%> off his <S%H5328>flower<s%> as the <S%H2132>olive.<s%>
For the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of <S%H2611>hypocrites<s%> shall be <S%H1565>desolate,<s%> and <S%H784>fire<s%> shall <S%H398>consume<s%> the <S%H168>tabernacles<s%> of <S%H7810>bribery.<s%>
They <S%H2029>conceive<s%> <S%H5999>mischief,<s%> and <S%H3205>bring<s%> <S%H3205>forth<s%> <S%H205>vanity,<s%> and their <S%H990>belly<s%> <S%H3559>prepares<s%> <S%H4820>deceit.<s%>
